46.eng-name: The Book of Cutting off the Hand of the Thief

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Sufyan, from Abu Az-Zubair, from Jabir that:the Messenger of Allah robber and pilferer is not to be cut off." (Sahih) Sufyan did not hear it from Abu Az-Zubair

chapter.eng-name: Things for which the hand may not be cut off
